mxTextCell.title: Text
mxTextCell.label: fire(source): Fires the node "source" each step
mxTextCell.prevLabel: fire(source): Fires the node "source" each step

mxTextCell.title: Text
mxTextCell.label: fireAll(source1, source2): Fires the nodes "source1" and "source2" simultaneously
mxTextCell.prevLabel: fireAll(source1, source2): Fires the nodes "source1" and "source2" simultaneously

mxTextCell.title: Text
mxTextCell.label: fireSequence(s1, s2): Fires the nodes "s1" and "s2" in succesion
mxTextCell.prevLabel: fireSequence(s1, s2): Fires the nodes "s1" and "s2" in succesion

mxTextCell.title: Text
mxTextCell.label: fireRandom(s1, s2): Fires one of the 2 sources, chosen randomly
mxTextCell.prevLabel: fireRandom(s1, s2): Fires one of the 2 sources, chosen randomly

mxTextCell.title: Text
mxTextCell.label: if(pool>2) fire(source): Fires "source" once the value in "pool" is greater than 2
mxTextCell.prevLabel: if(pool>2) fire(source): Fires "source" once the value in "pool" is greater than 2

mxTextCell.title: Text
mxTextCell.label: if(pool>3&&pool<8) fire(source): Fires "source" while the value in "pool" is greater than 3 and less than 8
mxTextCell.prevLabel: if(pool>3&&pool<8) fire(source): Fires "source" while the value in "pool" is greater than 3 and less than 8
